reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other Contractual Services NOC (A, B, C) (ITA) (INS) (FAS). GATA Niger Raytheon. Tech Assistance for Power Sector of Angola. Technical Support for Peru/Chile. Tech Asst for Geothermal Dev St Kitts and Nevis. Tech Assistance for Power Sector of Bangladesh. Tech Assis Reg Pwr Market Develop Central America. Tech Assistance for Power Market Reform in Mexico. Vehicles - R&M

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes Train, Eval & Oth Related Act. Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States..
